title: Everyday Driver's Paul & Todd
description:
Longtime friends Paul and Todd host a great youtube channel (and podcast) called "Everyday Driver", where they do head-to-head tests, road trips, and long-form videos paying homage to legendary cars and marques. 

www.youtube.com/everydaydriver

This show is also a video! https://youtu.be/ugDJ2B0BiGc

 

www.youtube.com/everydaydriver
www.everydaydriver.com
T: @thesmokingtire @everydaydriver
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
